messages.message:
I was trying to log in and I noticed that there's some SQL error exposed on the `/account` path whereas other paths (like `/account/`) 404. Is this expected?

Behavior: First image shows some SQL error. Second image is a 404
i think this is because a route like `/account` is routed to our file system app (Explorer) vs the route `/account/` is routed to our login app (and the root route doesn’t exist on our login app)
i’m not able to reproduce your first screenshot though, which env is this on?
prod. to replicate I open up chrome private browsing and navigate to like https://instabase.com/a
I also get the error on safari private browsing
got it, i’ll file a bug
